short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save time and money. LinkedWolf will do 98% of the work for you thanks to automatic campaign scenarios.
short.pl: OszczÄ™dzaj czas i pieniÄ…dze. LinkedWolf wykona za Ciebie 98% pracy dziÄ™ki automatycznym scenariuszom kampanii.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Welcome to the best LinkedIn lead generation software that can be managed via a browser from anywhere in the world!

We offer an automatic generation of leads in LinkedIn. Our services allow you to automatically send connection requests and messages. Automate visits and skill endorsements. Create a team campaign, use the team manager and chat from anywhere in the world! This is the best automation tool.

â­LinkedWolf featuresâ­ :

ğŸ”¥ Campaign scenario it is an advanced marketing automation feature that allows you to define the entire scenario for the campaign. You can set tasks such as connecting, visiting, endorsing skills and sending messages with the option of setting the exclusion of users who have received a message from you or written to you.
âœ”ï¸	Team CRM - manages all your profiles in one dashboard via a browser from anywhere in the world
âœ”ï¸	Chat Manager - manages all your profile chats in one dashboard via a browser from anywhere in the world
âœ”ï¸	Creating campaigns without limits
âœ”ï¸	Sending bulk connections with a personalized message
âœ”ï¸	Sending bulk personalized messages
âœ”ï¸	Vocative Case function - changes only Polish first names (e.g. Filip -> Filipie);
âœ”ï¸  Three types of messages - We have an option to set three types of messages depending on gender (a woman, a man and other). It applies only for Polish language.
âœ”ï¸	Skipping users who received or responded to a message
âœ”ï¸	Creating follow up messages for campaigns
âœ”ï¸	Creating a team campaign and adding other users to your campaign
âœ”ï¸	Automatic profiles visiting function
âœ”ï¸	Automatic skill endorsements function
âœ”ï¸	No duplicate profiles - automatic exclusion of duplicate profile in the campaign during import
âœ”ï¸	Importing all 1st connections, sent messages, visits or skill endorsements;
âœ”ï¸	Removing pending connections with one click
âœ”ï¸	Automatic LinkedIn limit detection
âœ”ï¸	Exporting or importing your data to CSV file
âœ”ï¸	Compatible with Linkedin Free, Sales Navigator and Premium

It is a completely safe option for users because of the simulation of your manual work. It causes random delays after each action and has a huge set of features.
It is the best lead generation software for LinkedIn and has more features than: ProspectIn, Dux Soup, Octopus CRM, Linked Helper.
